page.shortlink: api objects session object format file data url method
page.description: Returns a URL suitable for a browser to retrieve a session file.

argument.name: Key as C
argument.description: The key of the file in the session-state collection. The value of key is a file name without any path components.

page.discussion: Context.Session.FormatFileDataURL() returns a URL suitable for a browser to retrieve a session file. No assumptions should be made about the construction of this URL. Check *[link:Context.Session.CallResult.Success@./index.xml#section1_CallResult]* before using the return value.
